snippet.title: Mr. Bubble (PC) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Game that came bundled with the eee stick, featured in my video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nbjwYFo8SsQ

I realized after shooting and editing the main video that I didn't mention at all how the "motion features" are used in that game AT ALL, but, well... There is a reason for that.

They just bound the "shaking" of the remote to one keyboard key.
You can play the entire game without the remote and it's a better experience.
It still sucks, but that tells you how much of an afterthought the remote was when designing that game.
